job description:
We're looking for a Tableau expert to create vizualizations from our clients multiple data sets and provide insightful analysis. Our clients are multi-unit restaurant groups throughout the United States for whom we provide outsourced analytics. We do this utilizing a SQL data warehouse over which we lay Tableau. Our job is to advise our clients on trends and other opportunities that we see in their data. We do this by utilizing Tableau dashboards, and standardized and adhoc reports Our clients data includes full point of sales transactional, labor, distribution, social and other forms of both structured and nonstructured data. Fluency in English preferred.

Job Types: Full-time, Part-time, Contract

Salary: $75,000.00 to $125,000.00 /year

Experience:
  • Tableau: 2 years (Required)
  • SQL: 2 years (Required)
Language:
  • English (Required)
